data.name: Whatsapp Web Dark 127
data.description:
Dark mode for WhatsApp Web built from scratch using the internal variables from the original CSS.
Adds dark mode to all features. (If you find anything wrong with it please contact me)

data.name: Hard earn money off this roblox channel
Retroing
Dark Theme - (new) Blogger
data.description:
A dark theme for New Blogger.
It does include stuff for their old theme, but that serves more like an anti flash bang in case you accidently opened the old theme.

Specials:
- HTML Editor after Notepad++ Deep Black XML style
- Semi-Easy adjustment for your personal taste since it's only using 6 colors
- Some smaller spacing improvements that I thought were useful


Tags: Dark Theme, Dark Mode, Blogger, New Blogger, Blogspot, New Blogspot, Clean, Purple,

data.description:

Note: Not tested on mobile devices.

data.name: Lsj.gr Dark 2
data.description: Dark theme for lsj.gr (Mediawiki-based using Timeless skin)

data.name: Flight Rising Erase Basic Scenes (Darkmode)
data.description:
Dark-mode compatible, just follow the instructions inside. A way to hide basic scenes, but have other scenes still visible. Should work, let me know if it's super janky. You could use it on your own, but it's generally meant to be used alongside Darkmode, so you can still see scenes, since the maker didn't add that to the latest update.

If they want to add this into their style or w/e I'm totally fine with it! I just thought I'd post my fix here because I'm shy and wouldn't want to confront anyone.

data.name: userstyles.org (Dark Mode)
data.description: Owh c'mon man, we need at least a DARK MODE of Userstyles.org since this is the website that allows people to modify many CSS's including DARK MODE of many other websites. So, here it is.
